data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Oliveira, Luiz Fernando M., Brescovit, Antonio D. (2015): Two new species of the Neotropical spider genus Umuara Brescovit (Araneae, Anyphaenidae, Anyphaeninae) from Brazil. Zootaxa 3980 (3): 435-441, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3980.3.7
